faq.name: faq
faq.label: Wheel of Fortune
faq.title: Frequently Asked Mystical Questions
faq.description: More questions? Join our Hermetic study group.

items.title: How does digital divination differ from physical tarot?
items.description: Arcanum simulates esoteric resonance through algorithms, with all digital rituals following Golden Dawn purification protocols. We use quantum-random number generators to simulate shuffling enhanced by biometric resonance.

items.title: How to ensure reading accuracy?
items.description: We recommend performing readings in quiet spaces after brief meditative cleansing. The system automatically suggests optimal spreads (Celtic Cross for complex matters, 3-Card for short-term guidance) based on your question type.

items.title: Which tarot system should I choose?
items.description: Marseille excels for numerical symbolism; Rider-Waite's imagery aids beginners; Thoth offers depth for magicians; Golden Dawn integrates Qabalistic wisdom. Arcanum lets you compare interpretations across systems for the same question.
